verses.verse: Now Hiram <S%H2438><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, and timber <S%H6086><s%> of cedars <S%H730><s%>, with masons <S%H7023><s%> and carpenters <S%H2796><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%> him an house <S%H1004><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> perceived <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had confirmed <S%H3559><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>, for his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> was lifted up <S%H5375><s%> on high <S%H4605><s%>, because of his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> more wives <S%H802><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> fathered <S%H3205><s%> more sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Now these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his sons <S%H3205><s%> which he had in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; Shammua <S%H8051><s%>, and Shobab <S%H7727><s%>, Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, and Solomon <S%H8010><s%>,
And Ibhar <S%H2984><s%>, and Elishua <S%H474><s%>, and Elpalet <S%H467><s%>,
And Nogah <S%H5052><s%>, and Nepheg <S%H5298><s%>, and Japhia <S%H3309><s%>,
And Elishama <S%H476><s%>, and Beeliada <S%H1182><s%>, and Eliphalet <S%H467><s%>.

And when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was anointed <S%H4886><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, all the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>. And David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it <S%H3318><s%>, and went out against them <S%H6440><s%>.
And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spread <S%H6584><s%> themselves in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Shall I go up <S%H5927><s%> against the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>? and will you deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand <S%H3027><s%>? And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5927><s%>, Go up; for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

So they came up <S%H5927><s%> to Baal <S%H1188><s%>–perazim; and David <S%H1732><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them there <S%H1732><s%>. Then David said <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> has broken in <S%H6555><s%> upon my enemies <S%H341><s%> by my hand <S%H3027><s%> like the breaking forth <S%H6556><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%>: therefore they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Baal <S%H1188><s%>–perazim.
And when they had left <S%H5800><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%> there <S%H1732><s%>, David gave a commandment <S%H559><s%>, and they were burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.
And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> yet again <S%H3254><s%> spread themselves abroad <S%H6584><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%>.

Therefore David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> again of God <S%H430><s%>; and God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5927><s%>, Go not up after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H5437><s%>; turn away from them <S%H935><s%>, and come upon them over against <S%H4136><s%> the mulberry trees <S%H1057><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H8085><s%>, when you shall hear a sound <S%H6963><s%> of going <S%H6807><s%> in the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mulberry trees <S%H1057><s%>, that then you shall go out <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>: for God <S%H430><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to strike <S%H5221><s%> the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

David <S%H1732><s%> therefore did <S%H6213><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H5221><s%>: and they struck the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> from Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> even to Gazer <S%H1507><s%>.

And the fame <S%H8034><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> into all lands <S%H776><s%>; and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5414><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of him upon all nations <S%H1471><s%>.
